page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN SOUTH LEEDS
page.content: We are a fourth year class at Hunslet C of E Middle School. We did a survey of employment within the families in our class. Despite the economic situation and the frequency of redundancy, all our fathers go to work at a variety of jobs. Here is a list of some of them: photographer,bus driver,lorry driver,miner,post office worker, builder,taxi driver,gas board fitter. One father works in a casino and one is self employed.Many mothers also work(70%).Their work too,is varied. They work in offices and schools(as dinner ladies or cleaners), Home helps, shop assistants, canteen workers, film developers and Post Office assistants. 33% of our class have jobs as well. we have paper rounds or are babysitters.
